column5: Hi all, headed to Yellowknife and will have some time to fish. Anyone have any experience with a charter operator there? Will probably have a morning or afternoon to fish.
There's one or two in town. When you going to be up here?
Dave  will exchange construction help for guiding, Just a thought Dave!
I'll take him out anyway. As long as he doesn't mind down rigging for lakers. As long as our schedules match up.
If he's smart he'd take you up on that offer, I sure would.
Now that is an offer I would not pass up on. Do you not jig for them as well Dave ?

I do but when I find a good  concentration of them. Last night would have been a good night for jigging but I took my jig rods out of the boat as I have been doing well downrigging. Last night they were super active and aggressive. They were coming up 30 or more to hit my spoon. Had 3 smack the cannon ball.
